title: nAthan veTrivEla
sahitya:
nAthan veTrivElan pAdam nI paTriDu vEdanaiyaTra peru vAzhvaip-peTriDa manamE


anupallavi

  bhUtalamIdu shUdu vAdugaL Edu munnai tIdu sheyyAda pErum Adaravaip-peravE


caraNam    tuyarak-kaDaliDai ayarAdu karai sEra tiranEdum ilAdu tighaippurum pOdu
dayavODu abhayam tandaruL purindu bhayamODa kepai sheyyavEyirandu
